actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to extend to 60 days the number of days of annual leave which may be accumulated by employees who have completed 25 years or more of service.

summary.text: Increases from 30 to 60 days the amount of annual leave which a Federal or District of Columbia employee who has completed over 25 years of service may carry over to the first biweekly pay period of each year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to extend to 60 days the number of days of annual leave which may be accumulated by employees who have completed 25 years or more of service.
